title: Comparative Program for Oral and Written Feedback to Enhance Virtual Suture Skill Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Implementation of a virtual learning environment to overcome face-to-face clinical practice constraints during the COVID-19 pandemic

learning_goals: Learners can perform simple suturing techniques with 80% accuracy using a virtual suturing simulation tool
Learners can derive improvements for at least three items on the suturing technique checklist based on oral/written feedback
Learners can achieve level 4 or higher on the 5-level GRS (Global Rating Scale) evaluation criteria
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
